chantey.title: John Francois
chantey.text:
Oh, Boney was a warrior, _Away,_ hey way! Oh, Boney was a warrior, _John Francois._ % it is noted that Francois is pronounced "Franswar"
Oh, Boney went to Roo-shy, Chorus.
Oh, Boney went to Proo-shy, Chorus.
He crossed the Rock Mountains, Chorus.
He made a mistake at Waterloo, Chorus.
He died at Saint Helena, Chorus.
